tool_description: Generate PDFs, Images, and more from HTML and URLs
title: cloudlayer.io

api_list.name: Convert URL to Image
api_list.description: Make a GET request to convert url to image, accepts simple options as query strings in URL (use POST endpoint for advanced options).

api_list.name: Convert HTML to Image
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert HTML into an image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cloudlayer-io.p.rapidapi.com/v1/html/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cloudlayer-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert URL to Image
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert any publicly accessible URL into an image.

api_list.name: Convert HTML to PDF
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert HTML into a PDF.
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cloudlayer-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Covert URL to PDF
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert any publicly accessible URL into a PDF.

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cloudlayer-io.p.rapidapi.com"
